#include <stdio.h>
#define siz 50100
#define LL long long

LL A[siz], F[siz];

main()
{
int fall, N, C, i, r, v, m, z;
LL x, y;
for(scanf("%d",&fall); fall--; printf("%lld\n",(y-=(v>0)?(F[z]*v):(0))))
	{
	for(i=!!scanf("%d %d",&N,&C); i<=N; scanf("%lld",&A[i++]));
	for(i=0; i<N; scanf("%lld",&F[i++]));
	for(y=F[N]=r=v=!(m=z=-1); r<N;)
		{
		for(i=r-(m=-1); i<=N&&!(A[i]-A[r]>C); i++)
			if(F[i]>=F[r])
				m=(m==-1||F[m]>=F[i])?i:m;
			else
				{
				m=i;
				break;
				}
		if(F[m]<F[r])
			{
			if((x=A[m]-A[r])>v)
				{
				y+=F[z=r]*(x-=v);
				v=0;
				r=m;
				}
			else
				{
				v-=x;
				r=m;
				}
			}
		else
			{
			y+=F[z=r]*(C-v);
			v=C-(A[m]-A[r]);
			r=m;
			}
		}
	if((x=A[N]-A[r])>v&&m!=N)
		{
		x-=v;
		y+=F[r]*(x);
		v=0;
		}
	}
return 0;
}
